description:
Harry has been given a string s consisting of lowercase English letters. He is also given an integer d. Harry needs to find a non-empty substring with at most 
d distinct characters and compute the maximum score for that substring. The score of a string is defined as the sum of hash values of all characters in the string.

**Input**:</br>
A string s consisting of lowercase English letters (1≤∣s∣≤10^5).
An integer d (1≤d≤26).</br>

**Output:**</br>
An integer representing the maximum score of a substring with at most d distinct characters.

**Input**:</br>
```
s = "slkawhbahsqsah"
d = 5
```
**Output**:</br>
```
83
```

**Explanation**:</br>
In the given example, a possible substring with the maximum score is "hbahsqsah".
The score is calculated as follows:
h (8) + b (2) + a (1) + h (8) + s (19) + q (17) + s (19) + a (1) + h (8) = 83.

**Input**:</br>
```
s = "ddbbaacc"
d = 5
```
**Output**:</br>
```
20
```

**Explanation**:</br>
In this example, a possible substring with the maximum score is "bbaacc".
The score is calculated as follows:
b (2) + b (2) + a (1) + a (1) + a (1) + c (3) = 20.
title: Maximum Score Substring
